list_definition.definition: an apparatus for transmitting, or a person who transmits

list_ex_of_english: The shape of the variance -mean relation suggests that in bright light transmitter release approaches zero, while in darkness transmitter release saturates the postsynaptic response.

A portion of the transmitters (factor r) returns from the synaptic cleft into the presynaptic hair cell.

Most of our arguments concerning vertical transmission require only transgenerational transmission, and relate to the temporal distance between the learning of transmitter and receiver.
It is known that exogenous application of a transmitter activates both synaptic and extrasynaptic receptors.
